welcome_message: Welcome {name}! Click the button to open our website:
unauthorized_error_message: You have no access to /{command} command. If you think it is a mistake, use /report command
generic_error_message: An error happened, we're working on it
empty_user_error_message: This command requires a telegram id as an argument. Example: /command 12345678
added_to_admins: You have been added to admins list, now you can use /adminhello command
